Love the way this top fits.  Gets a ton of compliments.  You can dress this up with a nice pair of pants and necklace or you can slip on a pair of jeans/capris and go super casual.  The color is amazing.  I have 2 of these now because of the fit & colors.  Going to order a couple more colors.
Purchased for my granddaughter for Christmas.  This is a nice quality top and the style flatters her.  It shipped promptly.

If you are on the fence regarding this top, buy it!  The neckline is absolutely gorgeous, fabric is soft, fit is comfortable, and the dart in the back makes it super flattering.  I got the Lavendar and plan on purchasing more colors.

评论概述: Shirt is cute…. Color is WRONG
评论详情: I ordered this shirt thinking it was the pretty maroon pictured. It was not. It’s red. Super red. Dark red. Not a bit of maroon in sight. That being said, it’s a cute shirt and washes well so I’m not mad about it. Just be aware of the color discrepancies.
I love the fit and the color.
Just what I wanted
Liked so much I ordered another one, different color.  👍

评论概述: 4 different colors all in XL and they all fit differently!!!
评论详情: I went by the reviews and order 4 different colors in this shirt all size XL. The first one i received the burgundy fit perfect so i was expecting great things. The fit was perfect and i love the color. I received the black and navy next and both fit totally different. the Black was so tight it was choking me and tight across the boob area. The navy was a little looser than the black but still tighter than the burgundy. Then i received the turquoise and it was too big! So I'm not sure what happened here but i will order another navy or black and see how it fits. Beside all that.....the burgundy one is perfect...fit and color!! i will post another review once i've ordered again.

It's so cute and well made that I gave it 5 stars, however the fabric does wrinkle easily during a car ride. Material is thin but not sheer, and is relatively soft. Will buy in more colors! TTS, washes well
Like the color and fit
Fits like a dream. Color is bright and beautiful. There's a nice stretch. Ordered two more.

It's a beautiful blouse but the proportions are entirely too small. I am a tiny person and ordered a medium when I usually order a small. This shirt fit almost like a crop top. Nowhere near the lengths featured in the photos. Not by a long shot. I'm not even sure that ordering a large would help as the medium stopped at the top of my Levi's. It's a cute shirt but cut for children. Such a shame. Returning.
XL does run big. If you are used to Large in a flowing around waist, it is perfect size. I'm big around stomach area. XL is perfect. Alittle long but I'll dry it. I'm only 5'2"
Shirt fits exactly like picture! Color is beautiful and fabric is good quality!
Love the fit and style, may order in different colors!

I love the flowing, loose comfort of the blouse. I ordered burgundy, but received a very deep red. I wouldn’t say it’s the red listed as a choice, but it’s not the burgundy that’s listed either. I like it and kept it but would love to have one in that burgundy shown. I’ve ordered several colors now.
Such a cute blouse. Made very well.

I absolutely love this shirt! But, be warned! Never ever wash it with darker clothes! I did and the little fuzzies on the shirt became little dark fuzzies! All is well though. I just bought another one!! That's how much I like this shirt.
Great shirt

love them both, so great  I ordered 2 different colors.  Very comfortable

I got this to go with my long skirt Boho style. It’s really cute.
I love the color of this and it fits perfect! It’s true to size with just enough flow.
Great value for money  , fits loose. Will buy in different colors!

As soon as I opened the package I was turned off by the color. No vibrancy at all. Did not look like it did online. Washes me out. Might look okay on someone with darker skin -- I am very pale. I don't think the synthetic fabric takes color dyes very well. The fit is nice, the feel is nice and I'll probably wear it. Might have to accessorize with a scarf or something.
Great fit
This material is light weight,soft and flows nice yet still has a fitting shape, nice for summer weather or great color for autumn. Washes well, no wrinkles and price is good

This shirt is so flattering, I bought it in four colors. True to size, I wear an XL. I get compliments every time I wear it. Great price - washes well, great quality.
This order was left in my mailbox. It arrived on time and in good condition.
Fits true to size, nice material! Love this shirt!
Fits great.  Nice quality fabric.  Washes nice. Gets lots of compliments.
Love this shirt and get many compliments. Will likely order another one in a different color as well. Fits really nice and is flattering. Does not require ironing with every wash, thankfully!

评论概述: Nice blouses  - good for work or casual
评论详情: Nice blouses.  But when they come in they are very wrinkle.  It is hard to get all the wrinkles out.  I had to steam iron them out.Also I bought one of these blouses from Temu for half the price from Amazon.  Same blouse just different color.
I have this in white and purple and they are the same with a top button closure in the back. This one has 4 decorative wood buttons down the back. Not a huge deal but definitely different.

Highly recommend. I bought this to wear after my breast cancer surgery. I received many compliments since it’s cute and stylish. Work appropriate. It is loose enough to camouflage what you want hidden, but not so loose that it looks sloppy.
This is comfy and gives space over my tummy. I love the color and ordered four more in other colors. Be careful washing. Make sure to use the hand wash or delicate cycle. Do not dry in the dryer.
I get so many compliments on this top  It’s a great color, comfortable and dressy enough for most jobs
I was leery buying clothing in Amazon because I’ve gotten some really awful, China-cheap pieces that look nothing like the picture, but this is a good one. Cute on, washes well. Great purchase.
Very nice top. Fit was perfect! Looks very dressy. Love it!
This casual top is great for work. Came out of the dryer ready to wear with no wrinkles. Might buy at least one more in a different color.

I purchased this top in white and reordered in red. Size L and I'm 5'6" - size 10/12. It's very flattering and not see thru at all. It is vacuum packed. I washed in cool water and hung /air dried. Then used a steamer to release the wrinkles.
Great top, good fit, beautiful color!
I like the fit on this shirt. It’s loose, long enough and just plain cute. It washed very well. I like to hang dry my shirts and it turned out great.
Loved the color and how flattering this blouse is! Great quality and true to size.
Fits great, nice material, bought several colors, can dress up or down
